title: Thai chicken broth (Tom ka ghai)
ingredients: ['For the Thai paste', '300g green Thai chillies', '10g palm sugar', '1 thumb-sized piece root ginger', '6 garlic cloves', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 stalk lemongrass', '2 limes, juiced', '30ml fish sauce', 'For the broth', '5 shallots, chopped', '1 chicken breast fillet, shredded', '2 tablespoons Thai paste', '100ml rice wine', '1L chicken stock', '1 red pepper, thinly sliced', '50g rice noodles', '2 shallots, thinly sliced', '1 (5cm) piece leek, shredded', 'finely chopped coriander to taste', 'soy sauce, for serving', 'chilli flakes, for serving']
